title: Bug 102436: Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: Bug 102436: Date/time value not stored correctly in report design. An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) is not being rejected as it should be.
OB: (1) The date value is not being validated by the UI or Model.
EB: (2) The invalid date value should be rejected and an error message should be displayed to the user.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the BIRT report designer.
2. Create a new report parameter of type 'DateTime'.
3. In the 'default value' field, enter an invalid date string, such as '55/66/9999'.
